```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
flightdelay <- read.csv("~/Downloads/full_data_flightdelay.csv")
head(flightdelay)
```

View
```{r}
str(flightdelay)
```

Summary
```{r}
summary(flightdelay)
```

flightdelay %>% is.na()
```

```
